Mountain Bike Builder


Add New Bike
import { Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { Bike } from '../bike.model'; import { BikeService } from '../bike.service'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { BikesFilterPipe } from '../bikes-filter.pipe'; // import { BikeItem } from '../bike'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bike-list', templateUrl: './bike-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bike-list.component.css'], }) export class BikeListComponent implements OnInit { bikes: Bike[]; BikeListChangedSubscription: Subscription; term: string; bikesfilterpipe: BikesFilterPipe constructor(private bikeService: BikeService) { } ngOnInit() { this.bikes = this.bikeService.getBikes(); this.BikeListChangedSubscription = this.bikeService.bikeListChanged .subscribe( (bike: Bike[]) => { this.bikes = bike; } ) } search(value: string) { this.term = value; } }
